yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquweishengfulibu[nianjianbaozongechengzhanglvjiniandianzhidiaojieqingxing]baogaohoubiaosh'i,xingzhengyuanyunianyuerihedingnianjianbaoyiliaogeifufeiyongchengzhanglvshangxianwei,qingweifubuhengzhuojianbaocaiwuwending'gaishanyiliaogongzuotiaojian'quebaoyiliaofuwuliangnengchongzuhou,shenshenhedingnianzongechengzhanglv.lingweijiangdijileiliuganjiuyiduizhengtijianbaodianzhideyingxiang,weifubuyeyannijianbaodianzhidiaojiecuoshi.yuanzhangqingweifubutongpankaoliangyiliaoziyuanpeizhidetuoshixing,zengjingongwei'yiliaojizhaohufuwutixihezuo,kuodajianbaoziyuanshiyongxiaoyi,quebaojianbaozhiduyongxujingying.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,taiwanyongyouyouzhidejianbaozhidu,chutishengminzhongjiuyikejinxingjiyiliaopinzhiwai,yejianqingruoshizuqunjiuyidejingjifudan,shishehuiandingdejishi,yeshizhengfushizhengmanyiduzuigaodezhengcezhiyi.genjuquanqiuziliaokuwangzhangongbude[quanqiuyiliaozhaohuzhishu]()nianzhongpaiming,taiwanyilianxunianchanlianshijiediyi,chengjifeiran.chenyuanzhangzhichu,caizhengfushangrenyilai,jianbaozongezinianyiyuan,chengzhangzhinianyiyuan,nianpingjunchengzhanglvwei,chengzhanggongchaoguoqianyiyuan.nianjianbaozongechengzhanglv<ctrl.>,jingxingzhengyuankaoliangrenkoujiegouyuyiliaofuwuchengbengaibian'toubaorenkoushuchengzhanglv'jianquanyiliaotixifazhandengyinsu,binghengzhuojianbaozhengticaiwuzhuangkuang'jingjichengzhangyuguorenfudannenglideng,yunianyuerihedingnianmjianbaoyiliaogeifufeiyongchengzhanglvshangxianwei,bingtiqingquanminjiankangbaoxianhuizongexieshanghuiyitaolun.yuanzhangzechengweifubuhengzhuojianbaocaiwuwending'gaishanyiliaogongzuotiaojian'quebaoyiliaofuwuliangnengchongzuhou,shenshenhedingnianzongechengzhanglv.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,lijingnianduoyanzhongteshuchuanranxingfeiyan()yiqing,taiwanzinianyueriqijiangji,bingdiaozhengfangyicuoshi,zhubuhuiguirichang.youyuxiangguanyiliaofeiyonggaiyoujianbaozhiying,jiguorenyihoujiuyicishubodongzengjia,daozhinianjianbaodianzhichuxianmingxianxiajiangqingxing,chongjiyiliaofuwutigongzhe<crl>.youjianyuci,weifubuyannijianba
